tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: FIFA 13 | Gamescom Gameplay
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: Be sure to like Sorry about my audio, laptop's audio isn't very good lol. My Twitter: twitter.com My Facebook: www.facebook.com Audio by 3dNow: 3dnow.bandcamp.com

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: van persie was still at﻿ arsenal when the demo was made
Why is﻿ van persie at arsenal again?
I wasnt expecting a massive upgrade in graphics but come on its as if nothings changed at all if it wasnt for the new entrance and replay graphics you wouldn't even know it was the﻿ new game
I﻿ Will Kill You-3dNOW Double The Trouble-3dNOW

Well what do you expect really, this generation of consoles is almost over. You can't expect there to be a huge upgrade in the graphical department. The﻿ most we can hope for is improvements in the gameplay.
you cant judge that yet.....﻿
I only﻿ came to watch KSI
after the replay of the 2nd goal, all of a sudden you're 1-3﻿ ... wtf
you my﻿ friend are a true dumb fuck
its fake cause manchester unt bought van persie and hes on arsenal in﻿ the game
song names﻿ ?
look﻿ at the date this was uploaded on, retard
FUCK I HATE DUB STEP!!﻿
He is so.funny﻿
sometimes player still pass like﻿ an idiot, and where is first touching control?
lmao. fifa is always the same with no better gameplay PES﻿ always much better gameplay (just without the licences terrible game and non real footballers pay it!
checkout my channel for new﻿ boots and goalie gloves
why﻿ is van persie on arsnel he went to man u
bujpur﻿
He skipped﻿ 7' and a goal ;)
because van persie went to man u in the last month and this game has been in production for the past 10 months﻿ and they cant change the squads because it is releasing this month i believe
All these﻿ idiots saying it's a fake WHEN IT WAS PLAYED HE WAS STILL AT ARSENAL Dumb asses

I SEE THEY HAVENT DONE SHIT TO THE GAME!!!!!!! Its still completely fucked look at 02:48 when the left back casually strolls 10 yards behind the defensive line. That just doesnt happen at that level. I bet﻿ LOADS of their fuck ups still occur.
KSI﻿ ARMY
Good gameplay﻿

Reviewer.Music: Rock songs and IRA rebel music
